actionConfiguration.body:
select
	payment_ticket_status,
	payment_id,	
	payment_type,
	payment_status,	
	payment_mode,
	to_char(created_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_time,
	retailer_code,
	created_by,
	remarks,
	amount_paid,
	taxable_amt,
	gst_amt,
	to_char(payment_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as payment_start_date,
	to_char(payment_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as payment_end_date,
	transaction_id,
	to_char(transaction_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as transaction_date,
	payment_source,
	to_char(payment_clear_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as payment_clear_date,
	payment_clearance_status,
	payment_received_by,
	offer_id,
	amc_months
from
	public.payments where 
	retailer_code = {{retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}} and deleted=false
order by created_time desc
limit 20;
